bug.author: mcggood
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
When I load bart large model. (multi-lang-bart in fact) bart = BARTModel.from_pretrained('PATH', checkpoint_file='model.pt') I got this error KeyError: 'multilingual_denoising' While in the model file. in args, task='multilingual_denoising'. this task seems not supported by fairseq. <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
bart = BARTModel.from_pretrained('PATH', checkpoint_file='model.pt')

comments.comment: What command did you use to train model.pt? Also, please provide the full trace of the error you are seeing.

I don't use command. I don't train. I just want to load multi language mbart pretrained model. bart = BARTModel.from_pretrained('PATH', checkpoint_file='model.pt') the "PATH" is the files containing dict.txt, model.pt, sentence.bpe.model
